meanings.definition: The seed of the cotton plant, used for extracting oil and as animal feed.
meanings.sent1: Farmers collect cottonseeds to make oil.
meanings.sent2: Cottonseeds are a nutritious option for livestock feed.
meanings.sent3: The chickens on the farm had a cottonseed party, pecking at the seeds with delight.
meanings.sent4: In the field of agriculture, cottonseeds are the golden nuggets of the cotton plant.
meanings.sent5: The fluffy cottonseeds danced in the wind, ready to grow into new plants.
